name: Mahjong Classic :)
description:
Match beautiful tiles to pass the time while you challenge your mind with Mahjong :).

The single-player Mahjong :) brings the popular game to iOS for FREE. The goal is to expose the tiles underneath for play by matching open pairs of identical tiles and removing them from the board.

Game Features:
- Over 60 Mahjong games in varying levels of difficulty and all new gorgeous tile arrangements
- Simple and intuitive interface, and colorful, beautiful graphics.
- Unlimited Undo and Redo buttons.
- View progress with statistics that show top finish times for individual puzzles completed.
- Track quickest completion times from top Sudoku players in Leaderboards.
- Autosave feature so you can stop and resume the game anytime.
- Hints feature for guidance when you are stuck.
- Pan and zoom-in tiles.
- Customization options to tune the game into your individual Mahjong experience.
